text: Yordan Danchev (, born 27 August 1970) is a Bulgarian rower. He competed in two events at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Bulgaria Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Plovdiv
title: Yordan Danchev
